response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above the standard market price. Considering its high quality and potential impact on your business or lifestyle, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For this opportunity, I am proposing a price of $15,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value possible while also compensating us fairly for our investment and expertise in developing this product. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you further.", "product_price": 15000}
